radiographic_examinations.findings: There is wall thickening and mucosal hyper enhancement involving a 6.5 cm of terminal ileum, with similar inflammatory findings of the cecum. The appendix is thickened and dilated to 10 mm, with extensive adjacent periappendiceal right lower quadrant fat stranding. There appears to be a defect in the distal appendiceal tip, which may represent perforation. There is a small amount of adjacent free fluid, without a discrete drainable fluid collection. No evidence of free intraperitoneal air. Multiple other adjacent loops of small bowel are thickened.
